title: Bridging Economic Opportunity Through Open Data
summary: Since 2018, the Citi Foundation and Echoing Green have worked to create a more inclusive social entrepreneurship sector and support Fellows who represent and work with communities of color in the U.S. as part of the Inclusive Social Entrepreneurship Initiative. In this new report, three entrepreneurs are spotlighted to illustrate challenges they have faced in collecting research and insights, and the opportunities they foresee in leveraging data as a means toward social justice.
tag-1: Bridging Economic Opportunity Through Open Data
